author: kkolinko
msg: It is backport of r1145200, r1145237, r1145268
- Allow to specify character set to be used to write the access log in AccessLogValve
- Create directory automatically if it is a part of the file name
- Log a failure if access log file cannot be opened.
- Expose the new "encoding" option through JMX. Fix wrong mapping for "enabled" property.
- Create directory automatically if it is a part of the file name
